website_summaries.verdict: Responsiveness and visibility is comparable to other low-cost options, but the ShowMe stands out for its upgraded battery life, making it appealing for use in travel situations.
pros: Since mobility is a primary benefit of virtual keyboards, the ShowMe's 1000 mAh lithium battery is a big plus
Even with the additional battery time, the device maintains functionality, as keyboard visibility and keystroke response remain consistent over the longer periods of use
cons: This keyboard tends to be more difficult than some to see clearly, especially in environments with bright lighting

customer_reviews.title: Not Nearly Ready for Production or Deployment
customer_reviews.text: As many (honest) commentators have posted, this is a great concept and would be even better if it actually worked as expected. Even a hunt-and-peck typist will find him\herself waiting on this device, at times, and the accuracy is less than desirable. Too bad, really. A keyboard that an end-user could toss into their pocket or backpack, and then hit the road, is a terrific approach. It's too bad that product execution is still light years away (pun intended).

customer_reviews.title: Good and compact
customer_reviews.text: This is only marginally larger than a small box of matches, and smaller than a deck of cards. If you happen to use a Compute Stick, this is the tool you need for a keyboard. The Bluetooth connection also connects well to my Android-based cell phone. Like any other keyboard, it takes a little while to get used to it, but with the small size of the box, and the much larger size of the projected keyboard, it's a great tool at a very reasonable price.

product_meta.title: Virtual Keyboard, Laser Projection Bluetooth Wireless Keyboard for iPad iPhone 7 Samsung Galaxy S6 S7 Edge
product_meta.description:
FEATURES: 
1. This keyboard has been equipped with wireless Bluetooth mini speakers. You can use it as not only a wireless projected keyboard, but also a Bluetooth speaker for your iPhone 6, iPad, tablet, android smart phones, laptop and PC. However, please NOTE that its tone quality is NOT comparable with professional speaker because its voice cavity is limited! 
2. We changed mini USB port to Micro USB port in order to be compatible with more USB cables. Even if you lost the USB cable we sent to you, you can easily to find too much compatible cable around you. 
3. We upgraded the internal rechargeable battery from 600mAh to 1000mAh. It can work much longer. 
4. This keyboard supports auto sleep mode. When you leave it alone for 8 seconds, it will shift to energy-saving mode automatically. The projected keyboard will dim off. To wake it up, just move your finger on the projected area. 

ATTENTION 
1. This keyboard is NOT waterproof. Please keep it far from water. 
2. The laser is safe and passed tests of FDA. However, please don't let laser project to your eyes directly. 
3. If you don't use it frequently, please charge it fully at least one time per month. 
4. When the environmental light is strong, don't use it because the projected keyboard is not visible enough. 
5. When you use it, please put it on flat and opaque surface. When the keyboard keep beeping, it means it's not satisfied with the working surface.-:) Just put it on a flat and irreflexive surface, it will stop crying immediately. 
6. If there is anything else we can do for you, please ask a question on Amazon at your convenience. Our customer care center will respond with 12 hours.
